0.value:
//Build the DYNAMIC Object to send back to the parent script:
DYNAMIC greetdata

greetdata.greeting="Thank you for calling FordPass Rewards"
greetdata.hoop.id=5826
greetdata.hoop.timezone="Eastern Standard Time"
greetdata.hoop.message.holiday="We are currently closed for the observed holiday. Please call us back during normal business hours. Thank you."
greetdata.hoop.message.closed="We are currently closed. Please call back during 9am to 8pm, Monday through Friday and Saturday, 9am to 5:30pm to speak with a representative. Thank you."
greetdata.hoop.message.emergency="There is currently an emergency that is impacting our ability to answer your call. Please call back later. Thank you."
greetdata.lang.default="EN"
greetdata.lang.choice="No_Choice"
greetdata.ttsvoice="4: Sharon, Female (US)"
greetdata.flashmessage="No issues to report"
greetdata.next.action="queue"
greetdata.next.data="MUS_Rewards_FP_EN"

greetdatajson = "{greetdata.asjson()}"

//Build the DYNAMIC Object to send back to the parent script:
DYNAMIC GreetData

GreetData.Greeting = "Thank you for calling FordPass Rewards"
GreetData.Hoop.id = 5826
GreetData.Hoop.timezone = "Eastern Standard Time"
GreetData.Hoop.Message.Holiday = "We are currently closed for the observed holiday. Please call us back during normal business hours. Thank you."
GreetData.Hoop.Message.Closed = "We are currently closed. Please call back during 9am to 8pm, Monday through Friday and Saturday, 9am to 5:30pm to speak with a representative. Thank you."
GreetData.Hoop.Message.Emergency = "There is currently an emergency that is impacting our ability to answer your call. Please call back later. Thank you."
GreetData.Lang = "EN"
GreetData.LangChoice = "No_Choice"
GreetData.FlashMessage = "No issues to report"


//Convert the DYNAMIC object as JSON:
GreetDataJson = "{GreetData.asjson()}"
